Where to Buy Affordable Curtains After Moving

After moving to your new home in Addis Ababa, one of the first things you'll need is curtains to provide privacy, control light, and add style to your space. With numerous options available from traditional markets to modern stores, finding affordable yet quality curtains can be overwhelming. This comprehensive guide will help you navigate the best places to buy curtains that fit your budget and style preferences.

Traditional Markets (Best for Budget Shopping)

Merkato (Africa's Largest Market)

Location: Central Addis Ababa

Best For: Budget shopping, bulk purchases, traditional fabrics

Price Range: 200-800 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Cotton, polyester, traditional Ethiopian fabrics

Bargaining: Essential - start at 50% of asking price

Quality: Varies - inspect carefully before buying

Best Time to Visit: Weekday mornings (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM)

Tips: Bring a local friend for better prices, compare multiple vendors

Shiro Meda Market

Location: Near Addis Ababa University

Best For: Traditional fabrics, cultural designs

Price Range: 300-1,000 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Traditional Ethiopian fabrics, handwoven materials

Bargaining: Expected - negotiate for better deals

Quality: Good quality traditional fabrics

Best Time to Visit: Saturday mornings (8:00 AM - 2:00 PM)

Tips: Look for authentic traditional designs, ask about fabric care

Piassa Market

Location: Central Piassa area

Best For: Quick purchases, basic curtains

Price Range: 150-600 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Basic cotton, polyester, synthetic materials

Bargaining: Moderate - some room for negotiation

Quality: Basic to moderate quality

Best Time to Visit: Weekday afternoons (2:00 PM - 6:00 PM)

Tips: Check for defects, ask about return policy

Modern Shopping Centers

CMC Shopping Center

Location: CMC area, near CMC Hospital

Best For: Modern curtains, quality fabrics, professional service

Price Range: 800-3,000 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: High-quality cotton, linen, silk, synthetic blends

Bargaining: Limited - fixed prices with occasional sales

Quality: High quality, consistent standards

Best Time to Visit: Weekday mornings (10:00 AM - 2:00 PM)

Tips: Look for sales, ask about customization options

Bole Shopping Center

Location: Bole area, near Bole Airport

Best For: International brands, modern designs

Price Range: 1,000-5,000 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Premium fabrics, designer materials

Bargaining: Minimal - occasional sales and discounts

Quality: Premium quality, designer standards

Best Time to Visit: Weekend mornings (10:00 AM - 1:00 PM)

Tips: Check for seasonal sales, ask about delivery services

Addis Ababa Mall

Location: Bole area

Best For: Variety of options, modern shopping experience

Price Range: 600-4,000 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Wide variety of fabrics and styles

Bargaining: Limited - fixed prices

Quality: Good to high quality

Best Time to Visit: Weekday afternoons (2:00 PM - 6:00 PM)

Tips: Compare different stores, ask about installation services

Specialized Curtain Stores

Home Decor Stores

Location: Various locations in Addis Ababa

Best For: Professional consultation, custom curtains

Price Range: 1,500-8,000 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Premium fabrics, designer materials

Bargaining: Limited - professional pricing

Quality: High quality, professional standards

Services: Custom sizing, installation, consultation

Tips: Ask about design consultation, check portfolio

Fabric Stores

Location: Commercial areas throughout the city

Best For: Custom curtains, unique fabrics

Price Range: 500-2,500 ETB per curtain (fabric only)

Fabric Types: Wide variety of fabrics, imported materials

Bargaining: Some room for negotiation

Quality: Good quality, various options

Services: Fabric cutting, basic alterations

Tips: Ask about fabric care, check for defects

Online Options

Local Online Stores

Platforms: Local e-commerce websites

Best For: Convenience, home delivery

Price Range: 400-2,500 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Various options available

Bargaining: Limited - online pricing

Quality: Varies - check reviews and descriptions

Delivery: 2-7 days, additional delivery fees

Tips: Read reviews, check return policy, verify measurements

Social Media Sellers

Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp

Best For: Unique designs, direct communication

Price Range: 300-1,500 ETB per curtain

Fabric Types: Various options, custom designs

Bargaining: Direct negotiation with sellers

Quality: Varies - ask for samples

Delivery: Varies by seller

Tips: Ask for references, check seller reputation

Budget-Friendly Options

Second-Hand Curtains

Where to Find: Online platforms, local classifieds

Price Range: 100-500 ETB per curtain

Quality: Varies - inspect carefully

Best For: Temporary solutions, budget constraints

Tips: Check condition, ask about previous use

DIY Options

Fabric Sources: Fabric stores, markets

Price Range: 200-800 ETB per curtain (fabric only)

Quality: Depends on your skills

Best For: Custom designs, cost savings

Tips: Start with simple designs, practice on small pieces

Curtain Types and Prices

Basic Curtains

Fabric: Cotton, polyester

Price Range: 200-800 ETB per curtain

Best For: Budget-conscious buyers

Durability: Good for 2-3 years

Maintenance: Easy to clean

Medium Quality Curtains

Fabric: Cotton blends, synthetic materials

Price Range: 500-1,500 ETB per curtain

Best For: Balance of quality and price

Durability: Good for 3-5 years

Maintenance: Moderate care required

Premium Curtains

Fabric: Silk, linen, designer materials

Price Range: 1,500-5,000 ETB per curtain

Best For: Long-term investment

Durability: Good for 5+ years

Maintenance: Professional cleaning recommended

Shopping Tips

Before You Shop

Measurements:

  • Window dimensions: Width and height
  • Curtain length: Floor length or window length
  • Rod placement: Above window or ceiling
  • Fabric width: Consider pattern repeat

Budget Planning:

  • Total budget: 2,000-15,000 ETB for all windows
  • Per window: 200-2,500 ETB depending on quality
  • Additional costs: Rods, rings, installation
  • Maintenance: Cleaning, replacement costs

While Shopping

Quality Checks:

  • Fabric quality: Check for defects, loose threads
  • Stitching: Even, secure stitching
  • Color fastness: Test with damp cloth
  • Pattern alignment: Check for pattern matching

Negotiation Tips:

  • Compare prices: Visit multiple vendors
  • Bulk discounts: Ask for quantity discounts
  • Cash payments: May get better prices
  • End of season: Look for clearance sales

Installation and Maintenance

Installation Options

DIY Installation:

  • Cost: Free (your time)
  • Tools needed: Drill, screws, level
  • Difficulty: Moderate
  • Time: 1-2 hours per window

Professional Installation:

  • Cost: 500-1,500 ETB per window
  • Services: Measuring, installation, cleanup
  • Warranty: Usually included
  • Time: 30 minutes per window

Maintenance Tips

Regular Cleaning:

  • Vacuuming: Weekly with brush attachment
  • Spot cleaning: As needed with appropriate cleaner
  • Deep cleaning: Every 3-6 months
  • Professional cleaning: Annually for premium fabrics

Storage:

  • Clean storage: Clean before storing
  • Proper folding: Avoid creases
  • Climate control: Store in dry, cool place
  • Protection: Use covers to prevent dust

Conclusion

Finding affordable curtains after moving to Addis Ababa requires research, comparison, and smart shopping strategies. Whether you choose traditional markets for budget options or modern stores for quality and convenience, there are plenty of options to suit every budget and style preference. Remember to measure your windows accurately, set a realistic budget, and don't be afraid to negotiate for better prices. With the right approach, you can find beautiful curtains that enhance your new home without breaking the bank.
